attributes.action: Allow grassroots football to continue for children during the November lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: Vital for maintaining a good level of physical and mental health within children. Already been proved that the transmission rate between children outside is so low.
attributes.background: Allow outdoor grassroots and recreational football to continue within youth age groups.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Allow Grassroots football to keep going for juniors
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169
